deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 43 mins
features: SIZE - 36 (L) x 6 (H) inches when fully stretched. Conveniently comes with a loop at both ends, to ensure the ornament can hang easily with simple tape, or on a hook
MATERIALS - Handmade in Rajasthan, by Indian tribal women artisans. Decorated & embellished using cotton Pom Poms, Beads and 'Motis', Saraswati, and lovely golden colored bells at the bottom

YEAR ROUND USE - Suitable for all Indian festivals, and so you'll find yourself bringing this out on regular occasions throughout the year during each festival, to bring out the warmth, generosity & positivity of the occasion
FESTIVE GIFTS & DECOR - Either decorate your home, or present as an authentic, Indian handmade Festival Gift

YOUR PURCHASE IS SAFE: This product is packed securely & safely right out of the Artisans workshop, and exported directly to the Amazon Fulfillment Centers in the US, and fulfilled using the very best logistics partners. Your purchase is also protected by the Amazon returns, refunds & replacement policy. So buy with confidence, and add to your Festive decorations, or gift to someone special as a beautiful Diwali Gift

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Handcrafted Masterpiece For Your Home Every handmade item we offer, showcases the rich artistic heritage and skilled craftsmanship of our artisans. With intricate designs, vibrant colors, and exceptional quality, our pieces are unique, beautiful, and useful.

Sustainably sourced and made Our artisans only ever make small batches of our handcrafted products and avoid any surplus. Each of the products you receive are meticulously made one piece at a time out of ethically sourced materials. Supporting small communities By choosing our products you are playing your part in supporting artisans from small communities and helping safeguard age old techniques that have been perfected and passed down for generations. Carefully selected, quality material We source and work with the best material to make sure our products are sturdy, visually appealing and easy to install. You are assured of a good quality, long lasting product that is sturdy.

The use of simple tools combined with traditional techniques result in products with an old world charm. The irregularities in each piece come from the hand weaving and stitching, thus making sure no two products are the same- each one is as unique as the person using it.

Perfect For Festivities! Bringing the vibrant colours of India to you. Everything about these pieces are unique, beautiful, vibrant and picturesque and are a great addition to your festival or wedding decor, or any other event For Celebrations With Family These vibrant decorative pieces are often used as decorative elements during festivals and special occasions. They add a festive touch to the entrance of homes, temples, or event venues Add Color To Your Home These beautiful decoratives can be used to decorate and add color to your home, regardless of ethnic or cultural backgrounds. Their vibrant colors, intricate designs, and textures can add a touch of artistry and creativity to any interior space
Looking For A Gift? Who needs to travel far and wide to find something truly unique for your loved ones! Ideal for a variety of gift occasions Diwali GiftDussehra GiftGanesh Chaturti GiftHoli Gift
